# vfs

## package

- [tools/godoc/vfs](https://github.com/golang/tools/tree/master/godoc/vfs)
- [spf13/afero](https://github.com/spf13/afero)

## framework

```
+------------+      
| FileSystem |      +----------+
+------------+ <--- | Backends |
| File       |      +----------+
+------------+
```
